ranchers.name: Beatrix LeBeau
ranchers.description: The main protagonist of Slime Rancher. She is a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the 'Far, Far Range'.

ranchers.name: Hobson Twillgers
ranchers.description: The previous owner of the ranch before Beatrix. He left behind notes and messages for future ranchers.

ranchers.name: Thora West
ranchers.description: A rancher who provides Beatrix with helpful tips and advice. She is also Hobson's partner.

ranchers.name: Ogden Ortiz
ranchers.description: A farmer who specializes in growing exotic fruits and vegetables. He offers Beatrix various rewards in exchange for helping him with his farm.

ranchers.name: Mochi Miles
ranchers.description: A competitive and wealthy rancher who runs a slime racing business. She offers Beatrix rewards for participating in her races.

ranchers.name: Viktor Humphries
ranchers.description: A scientist and inventor who is fascinated by slimes. He offers Beatrix various rewards for helping him with his research.

ranchers.name: Bob
ranchers.description: A mysterious character who communicates through letters and seems to be obsessed with chickens.
